name: HellRealm
description:
HellRealm was and still is my first Doom Project ever the original maps go way back to 2010
But sometimes i still like to update them the maps are 90% Vanilla Doom compatible means you need a source port to play them my recommendation for this mapset is Crispy Doom.

To Play all 22 Levels of Hellrealm you need a original copy of Doom II or Freedoom.

Currently Hellrealm is on Hold due to the fact i need fresh ideas still after 12 years =)
HellRealm works as far as i know with all kown mods
